entities.description: Degree to which feelings interfere with home chores.
Degree to which feelings interfere with ability to do well at school or work.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 12 months.
Indicates the degree to which the respondent's feelings interfere with chores at home.
Indicates the degree to which the respondent's feelings interfere with their ability to do well at school or work.
